name: Demonology (Demo)
description:
Story:

John is a man living in small, middle-America town. After losing his wife and children to a tragic accident a few years ago, he’s haunted by inner demons. 

What happens when one of those demons finds a way to cross over?

Controls:

  • WASD or ARROW KEYS for movement
  • E for flashlight
  • X to smash
  • Z to aim mirror
  • SPACE to jump
  • ESCAPE to quit
  • R to reset

Note:--- Best enjoyed at ULTRA quality (The lower quality settings haven't been tested or optimized in this build)

Team:

  • Aim Diab
  • Glenn Macdonald
  • Michael Marney-Brusstar

Made for Pig Squad Summer Slow Jam: Horror edition in August 2020.
